News.headline: Match Officials: FC Halifax Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Match Officials: FC Halifax Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Match Officials: FC Halifax Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: Tuesday's referee for the Daggers' Emirates FA Cup away game against FC Halifax Town has been named as Thomas Bramall.
News.description:
The two assistants have been named as Rebecca Welch and Richard Watson with the fourth official being Craig Dean. 

Ticket information for the game can be found here.
